item.title: Clean your act up Forum-donators!
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:8, topic:70978”][quote author=blah bah7 link=topic=104295.msg1050233#msg1050233 date=1174850501]
i agree, they need to delete those locked files because it makes the tut section a frickin mess, and mute the people who say “lock this” from ever posting again
[/quote]
The last part is terrible.
We don’t want to have 92% of all members muted lol[/quote]

lol

item.title: Clean your act up Forum-donators!
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[quote=“fr33sc4p3, post:1, topic:70989”]That one of the only reasons moparscape is like it is because 90% of moparscape have come from runescape and are little kids wanting there own ‘Runescape’.
So they come here 9-12 year olds, Wanting there own ‘Runescape’ spamming everywere, not reading just to get what they want.
There needs to be some age limit but a way so they cant lie
All we need is lothy and taharok as a global and then they can punish people here, Because they spend most of there time on here anyway[/quote]

I am 12… The age doesnt matter. It is the maturity.

item.title: Clean your act up Forum-donators!
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

blah bah7:

i agree, they need to delete those locked files because it makes the tut section a frickin mess, and mute the people who say “lock this” from ever posting again

The second part isnt nessesary. The “lock this” thing, is just a way that people close their topics when they feel that its dead, or has gone offtopic, or just gone against their idea.
